scripts.start: echo "\033[31mWARN: 'start' will be depreciated soon. Instead use 'npm run serve'" && npm run serve
scripts.dev: echo "\033[31mWARN: 'dev' will be depreciated soon. Instead use 'npm run serve:dev'" && npm run serve:dev
scripts.serve:dev: nodemon --watch app --watch bootstrap --watch config --watch .env -x node server.js
